TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBinarySerialize

summary.span: 提供使用者定義型別 (UDT) 和使用者定義彙總序列化 (Serialization) 與還原序列化 (Deserialization) 的自訂實作。

span.span: Provides custom implementation for user-defined type (UDT) and user-defined aggregate serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者定義型別 (Udt) 和使用者定義彙總都必須先定義儲存格式，可為。`Native`User-defined types (UDTs) and user-defined aggregates are required to define a storage format, which can be either .`Native` 或。`UserDefined`。or .`UserDefined`. .`Native`.`Native` 可讓 SQL Server 處理序列化和還原序列化時自動執行，但此格式有限制的類型，它可以處理類型。allows SQL Server to handle serialization and deserialization automatically, but the format has restrictions on the kind of types it can handle. .`UserDefined`.`UserDefined` 可讓使用者定義型別和彙總處理自己的序列化。allows user-defined types and aggregates to handle their own serialization. 使用者定義型別和彙總都必須標記為。`UserDefined`User-defined types and aggregates must be marked with .`UserDefined` 在`SqlUserDefinedType`或`SqlUserDefinedAggregate`屬性，而且必須實作介面。in the `SqlUserDefinedType` or `SqlUserDefinedAggregate` attribute, and must implement the interface. 請注意，即使使用自訂序列化，每個執行個體的總大小必須是允許的限制，目前 8000 個位元組到最大值。Note that even with custom serialization, the total size of each instance must be under the maximum allowed limit, currently 8000 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Read(class System.IO.BinaryReader r) cil managed

param.name: r
param.span: 還原序列化物件的 資料流。

span.span: The stream from which the object is deserialized.

summary.span: 從其二進位形式產生使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或使用者定義彙總。

span.span: Generates a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate from its binary form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必須 deserialization 物件使用的資訊寫入方法。The method must reconstitute your object using the information written by the method. ## Examples 下列範例顯示實作方法會使用 UDT 的還原序列化先前保留的 UDT。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to de-serialize a previously persisted UDT. 這個範例假設 UDT 有兩個資料屬性：`StringValue`和`DoubleValue`。This example assumes that the UDT has two data properties: `StringValue` and `DoubleValue`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.IO.BinaryWriter w) cil managed

param.name: w
param.span: 將 UDT 或使用者定義彙總序列化至的 資料流。

span.span: The stream to which the UDT or user-defined aggregate is serialized.

summary.span: 將使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或使用者定義彙總轉換成其二進位格式，以便將它保存。

span.span: Converts a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate into its binary format so that it may be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 足夠的資訊寫入二進位資料流，以允許deserialization 您 UDT 或使用者定義彙總的方法。Write sufficient information to the binary stream to allow the method to reconstitute your UDT or user-defined aggregate. ## Examples 下列範例顯示實作方法會使用 UDT 的序列化 UDT 中的使用者定義的二進位格式。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to serialize the UDT in the user-defined binary format. Null 字元填補的目的是要確保的字串值完全分開雙精度浮點數值，使一個 UDT 與另一個 TRANSACT-SQL 程式碼、 比較字串位元組字串位元組和雙位元組比較為 double個位元組。The purpose of the null character padding is to ensure that the string value is completely separated from the double value, so that one UDT is compared to another in Transact-SQL code, string bytes are compared to string bytes and double bytes are compared to double bytes. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#2)]
